Translations.Text: Hoc est some de wisdom inspired to vos tuus Dominus. Vos non set alias deus DEUS lest vos finis Gehenna blamed defeated
Tuus Dominus dedit vos garcio habuit dum dedit angels filia!? Quam vos utter such blasphemy
Nos cited in hoc Quran (totus generis de examples) ut they take heed it unus augments their aversion
Dictus ibi est any alius deus Eum prout they claim they tried overthrow Possessor throne
He glorified He est much too exalted far supra their utterances
Glorifying Eum est 7 universes terra everyone them! ibi est nihil non glorify Eum vos non understand their glorification! He est Clement Forgiver
When vos read Quran nos locus vos those non believe in Hereafter invisible barrier
Nos locus shields their minds prevent them ex understanding it deafness their ears Ac when vos preach tuus Dominus using Quran alone they run aversion
Nos est fully aware de quod they hear when they listen to vos when they conspire secretly - disbelievers dictus Vos subsequentis crazy vir
Note quam they describe vos quam hoc causa them stray off path
They dictus Post nos turn into bones fragments nos get resurrected anew
